He was the chairman of the National Academy of Sciences of Ukraine.Prominent Ukrainian academician Paton dies at 101, UNIAN (19 August 2020)Interview with Boris Paton, Times Higher Education (22 November 2018) He was appointed to this post in 1962. He was known for his works in electric welding. He was born in Kyiv. He was elected a member of the Academia Europaea in 1991. Paton died on 19 August 2020 in Kyiv at the age of 101. ==References== Category:1918 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Centenarians Category:Ukrainian scientists Category:Members of Academia Europaea
